WHO Indicators: Average number of drugs per encounter
Formula: Total number of drugs prescribed ÷ Total number of encounters

WHO Indicators: Percentage of drugs prescribed by generic name
Formula: (Number of drugs prescribed by generic name ÷ Total number of drugs) × 100

WHO Indicators: Percentage of encounters with an antibiotic prescribed
Formula: (Number of encounters with ?1 antibiotic ÷ Total encounters) × 100

WHO Indicators: Percentage of encounters with an injection prescribed
Formula: (Number of encounters with ?1 injection ÷ Total encounters) × 100

WHO Indicators: Percentage of drugs prescribed from Essential Drug List (EDL)
Formula: (Number of drugs from EML ÷ Total number of drugs) × 100
